data.title: First U. S. edition, expanded
data.meta_description: Sauk City, WI: Arkham House: Publishers, 1949. Octavo, cloth. First U. S. edition, expanded. 3062 copies printed. Includes the contents of THE NEW GODS LEAD 1932 plus two stories first collected here and a new 2-page author's foreword. A fine copy in a fine dust jacket with a touch of wear to the upper right front corner tip and some of the usual tanning to the flap edges. 22703 .
data.text:
THE THRONE OF SATURN.

Wright, S[ydney] Fowler.

Sauk City, WI: Arkham House: Publishers, 1949. Octavo, cloth. First U. S. edition, expanded. 3062 copies printed. Includes the contents of THE NEW GODS LEAD (1932) plus two stories first collected here and a new 2-page author's "foreword." A fine copy in a fine dust jacket with a touch of wear to the upper right front corner tip and some of the usual tanning to the flap edges. (22703). Item #22703
